reviewMessage: Please review this article. Please reply in English, and the text after the review should be in the language of the article. Use get_kibela_note_from_path_or_url tool to get Kibela note. Use update_kibela_note_content tool to update Kibela note.
searchMessage: Search Kibela for this keyword or content. Please reply in English, and use search_kibela_note tool to search.
relatedNoteMessage: Please explore articles that may be related to the Kibela article at this URL. The reply should be in English, use the search_kibela_note tool to search for articles and the get_kibela_note_by_relay_id tool to view them.
reflectCommentPromptName: Reflect your comment on Kibela note
reflectCommentMessage: Please update the Kibela article at this URL to reflect the comment in this article. Please reply in Japanese and use the get_kibela_note_from_path_or_url tool to reference the article.
